P3.description:
# 软件在各个系统的支持表格
|APP NAMES| Android SUPPORT|IOS SUPPORT|MAC SUPPORT| LINUX SUPPORT|windows support|Official website|
|-----------|----------   |-----------------------     |--------------      |---------------------|----------------|----------|
|1.QQ| support|support|dmg file or appstore|support x86/64 or arm64 and loong arch and MIPS|QQNT support Windows7及以上的Windows 怀旧版支持XP|im.qq.com|
|2.微信|support|support|dmg file or appstore|UOS or wine|support Windows7及以上的Windows|weixin.qq.com|
|3.微信输入法|support|support|dmg file|no support|support Windows7及以上的Windows|z.weixin.qq.com|
|4.钉钉|support|support|support|support|support Windows7及以上的Windows|dingtalk.com|
|5.快手|support|support|Web version|Web version|Web version|kuaishou.com|
|6.minecraft(javA)|HMCLPE or FCL|can not on appstore download|HMCL|HMCL|HMCL |PCL|PCL(BILIBILI):https://space.bilibili.com/11343203/dynamic                HMCL:https://hmcl.huangyuhui.net|
|WSA|no support|no support|no support|no support|支持Windows10 22H2和Windows11所有版本|Not available at the moment|
|minecarft-java server|need Termux|no support|need java|need java|need java|https://www.minecraft.net/zh-hans/download/server|
|potplayer|no support|no support|no support|no support|support|potplayer.tv|

## minecraft-java server
### ubuntu/debian install code(root user)
`sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade && apt install openjdk-17-jdk && mkdir -p /data/minecraftserver && cd /data/minecraftserver && wget -d -o /data/minecraftserver/server.jar 'https://piston-data.mojang.com/v1/objects/450698d1863ab5180c25d7c804ef0fe6369dd1ba/server.jar' && java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar server.jar nogui`
####Next start(need install)
`cd /data/minecraftserver && java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar server.jar nogui`
### windows
1.<font color='red'>你需要至少安装Java17</font>
2.[下载文件](https://piston-data.mojang.com/v1/objects/450698d1863ab5180c25d7c804ef0fe6369dd1ba/server.jar)
3.在下载文件夹按住shift和鼠标右键选择**在此处打开命令窗口**或**在此处打开终端**
4.在终端输入`java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar minecraft_server.1.21.jar nogui`
### Termux install code
`pkg install openjdk-17 -y && mkdir ser && cd ser && wget 'https://piston-data.mojang.com/v1/objects/450698d1863ab5180c25d7c804ef0fe6369dd1ba/server.jar' -o server.jar && java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar server.jar nogui`
#### Next Use
`cd ser && java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar server.jar nogui`

P5.description: # 学校机房可用软件 ||名字|开发者|下载|其他| |---|---|---|---|---| ||Minecraft（PCL启动器）|龙腾猫跃|夸克云盘：链接直达&蓝奏云：链接直达|bilibili主页链接直达 &链接2的提取码为：pcl2&**有事请看下面Q&A专区**| ||哔哩哔哩(小破站)|上海宽娱数码科技有限公司|123云盘（自制便携版）：链接直达&官网下载：链接直达|**有事请看下面Q&A专区**| ||Java（Jdk17）||123云盘：链接直达&备用区：链接直达**有事请看下面Q&A专区**| # Q&A ## Q1 为什么夸克云盘下载不了 ### A：夸克云盘限速500KB/S，且需要下载客户端才能下载 ## Q2 为什么部分软件拥有分卷 ### A:123云盘的锅，100MB+的文件需要登陆才能下载😒 。
